texts.en: Yesaria is 53 years old, married, and lives with her husband and son.  She will use the money from this loan to buy merchandise for her business and increase her sales.  She plans to have a greater variety of items so that she can have greater earnings to share with her family.  She doesn't have the money for said purchase so she is asking for a loan.  This will be her first loan through FUDECOSUR. She has not had other loans in state banks before, but FUDECOSUR has provided a loan easily and with a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Gladis Seneida

texts.es:
Gladis tiene 47 años de edad, esta acompañada y tiene cuatro hijas de 30, 25,21 y 20 años de edad respectivamente. Vive junto a tres hijas, su padre y tres nietos. Ella es una mujer emprendedora que ha tenido que luchar por su familia; debido a que se separo del padre de sus hijas hace más de 15 años y enfrento la situación sola para mantener a sus hijas; pero hace un año ella volvió a rehacer su vida y se acompaño. Durante 15 años trabajo en la capital del país en un restaurante y vendió ropa en las diferentes colonias de la capital; fue así como poco a poco fue ahorrando para construir una casa muy humilde. Luego, regreso a la comunidad y con mucho esfuerzo instalo una tienda de productos básicos, como arroz, aceite, frijoles, azúcar, verduras, entre otros. La tienda esta abierta al público todos los días desde muy temprano hasta las 8:00 p.m. 

Los productos para la tienda los compra cada ocho y otros cada 22 días. Para irlos a comprar tiene que abordar un autobús que tarda veinte minutos en llegar a la ciudad y lo hace en compañía de una de sus hijas. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar arena, cemento, hierro, piedra y pago de mano de obra; para construir un muro de contención en su casa y una cocina; pues su casa solo tiene dos habitaciones y la sala. El crédito le servirá de mucho, ya que la casa es muy pequeña y el humo que genera la leña causa malestar en la familia y con la construcción del muro evitara que se lave el terreno ya que la temporada lluviosa esta por comenzar.  Así, su familia vivirá mejor más cómoda y sin enfermedades respiratorias.
texts.en:
Gladis is 47 years old, is in a relationship, and has four children, ages 30, 25, 21, and 20.  She lives with three of her daughters, her father, and three grandchildren.  She is an enterprising woman who has had to struggle for her family, given that she has separated from the father of her children more than 15 years ago, and she faced a situation where she has had to support her daughters.  It's been a year since she rebuilt her life and started a relationship.  During 15 years of work at a restaurant in the nation's capital, and selling clothing in different neighborhoods in the capital, she saved up little by little to build a humble home.  Later she returned to the community and with great effort opened a store to sell basic products such as rice, cooking oil, beans, sugar, vegetables, and other things.  The store is open to the public everyday from early morning to 8:00 pm.

She buys her merchandise every week and some of it every three weeks.  She has to board a bus for a 20 minute ride to the city to buy her merchandise, and she goes with her daughters.

She will use the money from this loan, through Fundación Campo, to buy sand, cement, iron bars, stone and to pay for labor to build a retaining wall in her home and also a kitchen.  Her house only has two bedrooms and a living room.  This loan will be very helpful since her house is small and the smoke from the wood fire causes harm to her family.  The wall will prevent her house from flooding, now that the rainy season is beginning.  This way her family will be more comfortable and not have any respiratory ailments.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Roman

texts.es: Don Roman de 53 años de edad es un hombre muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por brindarles lo mejor a sus hijos. Actualmente vive junto a su esposa y sus 7 hijos es muy trabajador, siempre lo ha realizado con alegría y entusiasmo, se dedica a ser agricultor siembra todos loa años los principales granos básicos de la zona como lo son: maíz y frijol. Don Roman desea incrementar sus ventas por eso solicita un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografia que es donde siembra sus cultivos. Desea contar con la ayuda solicitada puesto que no tiene otros ingresos monetarios, y así el seguirá llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Roman is 53 years old and is very responsible with his household obligations.  He is known for having provided the best for his children.  He currently lives with his wife and seven children and is very hardworking.  He has always worked with happiness and enthusiasm.  He is a farmer and raises corn and beans.  Ramon wants to increase his sales and is asking for a loan so he can buy seeds, compost, fertilizer, pesticides, and other things so he can improve his land shown in the photograph, where he plants his crops.  He would like help because he doesn't have another source of income and he would like to be able to continue providing for his family.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Ana Julia

texts.es: Gracias por apoyar a Ana en la compra de telas, pues con ello fabricó vestidos que vendió. Hoy nuevamente está aplicando a un credikiva con el cual comprará telas para fabricar uniformes encargados y con ello generará un nuevo ingreso. Ella envía un mensaje de agradecimientos a los financiadores de Kiva por su colaboración y pide que la sigan apoyando, para lograr crecer rápidamente.
texts.en: Thanks for supporting Ana in her purchase of fabric. She used it to make dresses that she sold. Now she is applying for another Kiva loan that she will use to buy fabric to make uniforms that have been ordered from her and which will give her new income. She sent a message of gratitude to the Kiva lenders for their collaboration and asks that they continue supporting her so that she can grow her business quickly.

loans.use: to buy fabric to make uniforms.

loans.name: Phon

texts.en:
Phon is a 58-year-old married mother of four children.  She lives in a rural village of Ou Reang Ov district, Kampong Cham province.  She is a hardworking farmer who grows cassava and rice on four hectares of farmland.  Together, with hard work, they can earn about 35,000 KHR per day and save about 20,000 KHR each day for their future needs.

Phon has been a member of VisionFund for one cycle already.  She has completely paid back the past loan which has helped her to better support her paddy business.  Now she is applying for another loan with VisionFund, in the amount of 2,000,000 KHR.  She will use this to buy fertilizer for her farmland and to pay for laborers plowing the field.  She hopes this loan will enable her to timely plant her cassava and rice so as to sell it for a good price.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and to pay for laborers plowing her paddy field.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ou Reang Ov district

loans.name: 3 De Abril Group

texts.es: El Banco de Emprendimiento 3 DE ABRIL está compuesto por ocho integrantes de los cuales siete son mujeres y un varón que se dedican a distintas actividades, la presidenta del banco es la Sra. Maribel en la foto es la de polera rosada, la que está sentada, la Sra. Maribel  tiene 37 años y cuatro hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar, ella es estilista, visita domicilios para realizar su trabajo ya que todavía no tiene su propio salón, pero ya le conocen y no le falta trabajo, ya que según sus clientas su trabajo es de buena calidad, solicita el crédito para la compra de material de peluquería como cremas para cabello y tintes , etc. para la realización de su trabajo, la Sra. Maribel es un apersona muy trabajadora, su deseo es poder tener un salón de belleza para así incrementar su clientela y brindar mayor comodidad a sus clientes, se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: The Entrepreneurial Bank Third of April is made up of 8 members, 7 women and 1 man, who work performing different activities. The president of the bank is Maribel, who is  seated and wearing the pink t-shirt in the photo. Maribel is 37 years old and she has three children who are in school. She is a stylist. She visits homes to complete her work because she still does not have her own salon. Her clients know her and she is not lacking work because her work is high quality. She seeks the loan to buy hairstyling materials such as creams for hair, dyes, etc. to perform her work. Maribel is a very hardworking person. Her wish is to have her own beauty salon in order to increase her quantity of clients and to provide improved comfort to her clients. She is happy and thankful to the bank for the support it is providing to her.

loans.use: to buy materials for a salon.

loans.name: Mutimumwe Group

texts.fr:
Pili fait partie du groupe  Mutimumwe  et habite à Bujumbura. C’est une veuve de 61 ans .
Elle a sous sa charge 3 petits enfants dont 2 étudient. 

Elle fait le commerce des pagnes et des assiettes  depuis  20 ans. 

Elle est à son cinquième crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle  obtient, elle va  augmenter son capital et acheter  beaucoup de pagnes et d’assiettes, à  revendre pour gagner plus.
 
Dans les prochaines années, elle voudrait  devenir riche et acheter un véhicule.
texts.en:
Pili is a member of the Mutimumwe group and she lives in Bujumbura.  She is a 61-year-old widow.  She takes care of three grandchildren, two of whom go to school.

She has been selling "pagnes" (West African colorful fabrics) and plates for 20 years.

She is on her fifth loan with Turame.  With the loan that she is receiving from KIVA, she will increase her capital and buy many pagnes and plates for resale, in order to make more money.

In the coming years, she would like to become rich and buy a vehicle.

loans.use: to buy many "pagnes" and plates for resale.

loans.name: Rodita

texts.en:
This is Rodita, 41, a resident of Silang, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Fernandico, an agent, and she is a mother to her child. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for her everyday expenses.
  
Rodita is a chicken dealer. She buys chickens in bulk and then sells them per kilo. There are many patrons who prefer her products since they are assured of its freshness and cleanliness.  Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns a minimum of PHP 6,000 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 11,000 loan. She will be using the loan to buy more chicken needed in her business. 

Rodita dreams that her business will expand and hopes that her child will finish his studies. She meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for more stocks of chicken needed in her business.

loans.name: Cirila

texts.en:
Cirila is a single, 65-year-old woman who lives in San Apolinario, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental.  Cirila sells snack foods to earn a living and has had this business for 6 years.  She has requested a loan to buy ingredients for the snack vending business.

Cirila has been a member of PMPC for 3 years.  In the future, Cirila hopes to improve her living conditions by using the profits of the business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her snack vending business.

location.town: Tangub - San Apolinario, Tangub City, Misamis Occi

loans.name: Maria Soccoro

texts.en:
Maria Soccoro is 47 years old, married, and blessed with eight children.  They are currently residing in a rural community where they can grow vegetables and maintain a livestock business.  Due to the increasing price of commodities, Soccoro runs a small variety store to generate additional income.  She aims to improve the business and become more profitable.  

She is now asking for the support of Kiva lenders, through ASKI, to borrow 13,000 PHP for more stocks of feeds for her hogs and different commodities for her store (i.e. canned goods, snack foods, beverages, detergent soaps, noodles, candies, seasoning, and soft drinks).  Being a hardworking mother, she believes that someday she will become successful in her small businesses.

loans.use: to buy more items for her store.

loans.name: Walter

texts.en:
Walter is 62 years old, married, and a father of six children. For the last two years, he has earned a living by selling farm produce in Mpeketoni, Lamu. He earns a monthly profit of KES 12,000. 

Walter was introduced to KADET LTD by our credit officer and is applying for his third loan of KES 25,000 to buy seeds, fertilizer, and other farm inputs needed for his business. He will use the profits made possible by this loan to pay school fees for two of his youngest children who are still in school.

His goal for the future is to venture into mixed farming with a hope of increasing his income so as to improve his financial stability.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizer, and other farm inputs for his business.

loans.name: Tarpanga Group

texts.fr:
Mme  PAULINE est responsable du groupe  TARPANGA. Mariée, elle est mère de 05 enfants. Le plus âgé a 23 ans et le moins âgés à 04 ans. 03 va  à l’école et elle a 06 personnes  en charge.
Mme vend des condiments depuis 03ans.  Elle s’approvisionne dans les villages environnants. Ses clients sont les  femmes, les hommes.
Elle veut s’acheter  02sacs de néré et des condiments secs.	
Elle  veut épargner  ses bénéfices . Mme  ambitionne agrandir son activité et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Pauline is the leader of the TARPANGA group.  She is married and the mother of five children.  Her oldest child is 23 years old, the youngest is 4.  Three of her children go to school.  Pauline supports six additional persons.

Pauline has been selling condiments for three years.  She buys her supplies in surrounding villages and sells to both men and women.

She wants to buy two bags of néré fruits as well as dry condiments.

Pauline wants to save her profits.  Her ambition is to increase her activity and to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy two bags of néré fruits and dry condiments.

loans.name: Rustam

texts.ru: Рустам женат и отец троих детей. Ему 29 лет. Он со своей семьей проживает в столице Таджикистана в городе Душанбе. Его жена домохозяйка. Рустам имеет среднее техническое образование. Он по специальности экономист, но он не работал в этой сфере. Он трудолюбивый и предприимчивый человек. У Рустама имеется грузовая машина ЗИЛ, на котором он перевозит товары в крупном размере. Рустам берет кредит на ремонт грузовой машины и на покупку шин. Рустам 9 лет работает в этой области, и он специалист в своем деле. В будущем он хочет купить легковую машину за счет дохода от деятельности и сдать в аренду.
texts.en: \Rustam is married and has three children. He is 29 years old. He lives with his family in Dushanbe, the capital of Tajikistan. His wife is a homemaker. Rustam has graduated from a technical college. He is an accountant by education, but he did not work in this field. He is a hard-working and enterprising person. Rustam has a ZIL [a Russian car brand] truck  which he uses to transport cargo. He is taking out a loan in order to repair his truck and buy new tires. Rustam has been working in this business for nine years and master it well. In the future he would like to use his revenues to purchase a passenger car and offer it for lease.

loans.use: to repair his truck and buy new tires.

loans.name: Adelina

texts.en:
Adelina is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. She is 54 years old and has one child who is in school.

She has a buy-and-sell livestock business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 17,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional livestock to sell.

Adelina has been in this business for 6 years. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock to sell.

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en: Myrna is 57 years old and married with four children. She lives in Tukuran, Zamboanga Del Sur. She owns and operates a food vending business in the local community to earn a living. She has been in her business for over eight years and earns 7,000 PHP every month. She joined GDMPC in 2011, and now she has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase additional products to sell. Her hopes and dreams are to have a better future and improve her living situation.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell

loans.name: Melinda

texts.en: Melinda is 25 years old, married and has one school-age child. She and her husband are both farmers residing in a rural community. Despite the hardships of living, they have the determination to uplift their status of living. Aside from farming, Melinda runs a small variety store in her village to generate additional income. She aims to improve and strengthen the business to make it profitable.  Lack of capital motivates her to borrow a loan of PHP 7,000 from KIVA lenders through ASKI.  This will be used to buy soft drinks, noodles, canned goods, sugar, detergent soaps, snack foods, beverages and seasonings to sell. She is hoping that someday her business will grow.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, noodles, canned goods, sugar, detergent soaps, snack foods, beverages and seasonings to sell

loans.name: Ren's Group

texts.en:
Ren, 58, lives with her three children in a rural village of the Tbaung Khmum district of Kampong Cham province, and she is a widowed mother. For the last 28 years, she has been struggling to feed the family by farming rice and planting cassava as the primary source of the family’s income. The current business earns her about 13,000 KHR per day, and she can save about 5,000 KHR each day for future needs.

Ren’s group consists of four members who live in the same village, and she is leading her group to request a loan. As the leader, Ren will use her portion to buy fertilizer for her farmland and to rent more farmland for growing rice and cassava. She hopes to get a high crop yield from her farming business so as to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and to rent more farmland.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Rael

texts.en:
Rael, 30 years old, is from Kakamega county. She is married to Mukala who is a taxi driver and supports the family financially. They are blessed with two children who are 10 and 4 years old.

She has a beauty salon and boutique in the same building. She has been doing these businesses for the last 13 years and makes a monthly income of KES 15,000.  She is taking her third loan with KADET LTD, which she will use to purchase clothing, curtains, a dryer and shoes for both her boutique and beauty salon. 

She will use the anticipated profit to expand the volume of the business. She has a dream of running a big business and building a home for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a hairdryer, new clothes, shoes and curtains.

loans.name: Nazrbibi

texts.ru: Назрбиби замужняя женщина. Ей 53 года. У нее двое взрослых дочерей. Старшая дочь обзаведена семьей и живет отдельно. Назрбиби имеет среднее образование. Она по характеру добрая и ответственная женщина. Назрбиби умеет вышивать национальные женские платья и намерена открыть свое дело в этой сфере. Чтобы реализовать свою цель Назрбиби обратилась за кредитом. Она просит кредит для приобретения компьютерной швейной машинки. Назрбиби планирует в день вышивать одно простое платье и одно платье с вышивкой. Она очень надеется на вашу поддержку.
texts.en:
Nazrbibi is 53 years old, married, and the mother of two adult daughters.  Her oldest daughter already has her own family and lives independently.  

Nazrbibi has a high school education.  By nature, she is a kind and responsible woman.  She knows how to make women's traditional Tajik dresses and she would like to start her own sewing business.  In order to reach this goal, she has requested a loan.  She will use her loan to buy an electronic sewing machine.  She plans to sew one simple dress and one embroidered dress per day.

Nazrbibi is looking forward to your support.

loans.use: to buy an electronic sewing machine.

loans.name: Emprendedoras Valientes Group

texts.es: El Banco de Emprendimiento EMPRENDEDORAS VALIENTES  está compuesto por ocho integrantes de los cuales seis  son mujeres y dos varones que se dedican a distintas actividades, la presidenta del banco es la Sra. Verónica tiene 34 años y es soltera con 2 hijos que tiene la edades de 17 y 7 años, ella se dedica a la venta  de pollos en su puesto de venta se encuentran en uno de los mercados de la localidad de El Torno. Este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución la Sra. Verónica va a usar este préstamo para la compra de un Frízer que le hace falta para conservar la carne de pollo,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es la falta de capital para la compra frizer, la Sra. Verónica enfrenta retos en su negocio que son crecer en clientela y va a utilizar los beneficios mejorar  la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Emprendedoras Valientes Communal Bank is made up of eight members, six women and two men who work in various jobs.

The president of the bank is Verónica, 34.  She's single and has two children, ages 17 and 7.  She makes a living selling chicken in her sales stall in one of the markets in the town of El Torno.

This is Verónica's first loan sequence with the institution.  She's going to use this loan to buy a freezer she needs to store her chicken.  Her reason for requesting this loan is she lacks the capital to buy the freezer.

In her business Verónica faces the challenge of expanding her clientele.  She's going to use the profits to improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a freezer

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en: Erlinda is 56 years old and married with four children. She lives in Tukuran, Zamboanga Del Sur. She owns and operates a fish vending business to earn a living. She has been in this business for over eight years and earns 4,000 PHP every month. She has been with GDMPC since 2008, and now she has requested a loan of 6,000 PHP to purchase fishing materials. Her hopes and dreams are to have a better future and improve her living situation.

loans.use: to purchase fishing materials

loans.name: Veloz Del Norte Group

texts.es: El Banco de Emprendimiento VELOZ DEL NORTE  está compuesto por ocho integrantes de los cuales seis son mujeres y dos varones que se dedican a distintas actividades, La presidenta del banco es la Sra. Julieta tiene 68 años, casada tiene dos hijos ya independientes, ella se dedica a la venta de polleras y enaguas  para la mujeres de polleras, tiene su puesto de venta  en la zona de  Puente Vela, este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Julieta va a usar este préstamo para la compra de polleras por mayor  para surtir su mercadería, ya que por esta fechas tiene mucha venta también entrega pedidos a los distintos mercados de la ciudad de El Alto,  la Sra. Julieta enfrenta retos en su negocio que son surtir su mercadería y va a utilizar los beneficios e seguir comprando por mercadería por mayor para surtir su negocio, la Sra. Julieta es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz por esta oportunidad que le brindan ya que esta es la única actividad que le permite mantenerse.
texts.en:
The entrepreneurial bank Veloz del Norte is made up of 8 members - six women and two men - who run different businesses. Julieta, 68, is the president. She is married and has two grown children. She sells skirts and petticoats for women at a stall in the Puente Vela zone.

This loan is her first as part of the institution. She will use it to buy skirts in bulk to stock up on merchandise, since she has a lot of sales during this time of year and she also delivers orders to different markets in the city of El Alto. Julieta faces challenges in her business like keeping it stocked and she wants to make use of the benefits and continue buying merchandise in bulk so she can maintain her stock. Julieta is hardworking and is happy with this opportunity since this business is the only way she is able to take care of herself.

loans.use: to buy skirts in bulk.

loans.name: Maria Antonia

texts.es: Doña Maria de 59 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y dos nietos. Ella posee un taller de costura en el lugar de su residencia donde confecciona diferentes tipos de prendas, últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela porque el trabajo que ella realiza es excelente y los elabora a precios realmente accesibles; élla es una mujer muy dedicado a su trabajo responsable y honesta, Maria esta solicitando un crédito que le permita comprar: telas, hilos, agujas, botones y todo lo relacionado con la costura para seguir satisfaciendo la necesidad de los clientes y asi ella y su familia puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en: Maria is 59 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and two grandchildren. She has a sewing workshop at her residence, where she makes different kinds of clothes. Lately she has earned many customers because that work that she does is excellent and she has accessible prices. She is a woman who is dedicated to her work, responsible, and honest. Maria is requesting a loan that will allow her to purchase: fabrics, thread, needles, buttons, and everything related to sewing in order to continue satisfying the needs of her customers. In this way, she and her family will be able to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy buttons, needles, fabric, zippers, etc.

loans.name: Israel

texts.es:
Achuapa Está Ubicada a 96 KM del departamento de león, es un bello y encantador municipio donde se dedican a la agricultura y la ganadería además de esto se dedica a las actividades artesanales. 

Israel se llama el señor de 48 años edad, Luchador por su vida y la de su familia, brinda su servicio en técnico de adquisición. 

Vive con su esposa y un hijo bajo su cargo, ella se dedica a estilista, con lo poco que gana ayuda en el sustento diario en su hogar.

Son de sus sueños mejorar construyendo una cocinita en su casa de habitación, por tal razón solicita a Kiva Y Ceprodel que le financie un crédito para la compra de: Cemento, Arena y madera. con esto ayudaría mucho a mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Achuapa, 96km from the department of Leon, is a beautiful and charming town where the people practice agriculture and raise cattle, as well as making artisan crafts.

Israel, 48, fights for his life and that of his family. He works as an Acquisition Technician. He lives with his wife and one son. His wife is a stylist, and she uses what little that she earns to help with household expenses.

One of his dreams is to build a small kitchen in his home, which is why he asks Kiva and Ceprodel for a loan to buy cement, sand and wood. This will help improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and wood.

loans.name: Clotilde

texts.en:
Clotilde is widowed with 4 children. She is 59 years old and lives in the Philippines.

Clotilde is a farmer and grows vegetables to earn a living. She has been doing this for 18 years. She has requested a loan to buy fertilizer and insecticide for her vegetable garden. 

Clotilde has been a member of PMPC for 3 years. In the future, Clotilde hopes to improve her living conditions by using the profits from the vegetable garden.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and insecticide for her vegetable garden.

location.town: Tangub - Guinalaban, Tangub City, Misamis Occident

loans.name: Raul

texts.es: Raul, de 42 años de edad , esta casado y tiene un hijo con su actual esposa pero tambien vive con sus dos hijos mayores en su casa propia.El trabajo de Raul consiste en el transporte de pasajeros dentro y fuera de la ciudad, está siempre presto para movilizar a cualquier cliente que desea llegar sano y salvo a su destino pues una de sus virtudes es ser muy cuidadoso y protector. Lleva realizado éste trabajo por 5 años. Su mototaxi lo adquirió como resultado del ahorro de su actividad como vendedor de productos regionales como “aguaje”, plátanos, yuca o pescados. Inicialmente este vehículo solo lo utilizaba como vehículo de carga, sin embargo los días que no tenía productos que vender dejaba su vehículo inutilizado, es por eso que ahora mediante su uso puede generar otra fuente de ingresos. Ha logrado complementar muy bien ambas labores y eso le da mas ganas de seguir adelante.Le gusta su trabajo pues le permite tener tiempo para estar a lado de su familia, además de poder movilizar a sus hijos a la escuela y a diferentes partes que necesiten, recuerda que empezó con éste trabajo muy joven y poco a poco fue ganando experiencia, espera seguir trabajando y fiel a su estilo seguir brindándole a su familia la oportunidad de progresar.En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 500 soles por lo tanto se siente agradecido con todas las personas que le brindan el préstamo que necesita para cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Con el monto solicitado comprará algunas piezas y repuestos para su mototaxi.
texts.en:
Raúl, 42, is married.  He has a son with his current wife but also lives with his two older children in his own house.

Raúl's job is transporting passengers inside and outside the city.  He's always ready to drive customers who want to arrive at their destinations safe and sound.  One of his virtues is being very careful and protective.  He has done this job for five years.

He acquired his motorcycle taxi with his savings from his job as a vendor of regional products such as "aguaje" fruit, bananas, yuca, or fish.  In the beginning he only used it as a cargo vehicle, but this left his vehicle unused on the days he didn't have products to sell.  This is why he can generate another source of income by using it.  He has managed to combine both jobs well, which makes him want to make more progress. 

He likes his job because it allows him to have time to be at his family's side and drive his children to school and other places they need to go.  He remembers that he started this job when he was very young and little by little gained experience.  He hopes to continue working and, true to his style, giving his family the opportunity to progress.

Currently he'll request 500 soles [PEN], for which he's grateful to all the people who are offering him the loan he needs to achieve his goals.  He also promises to make his payments on time.

With the amount requested he'll buy some pieces and spare parts for his motorcycle taxi.

loans.use: to buy parts for his motorcycle taxi

loans.name: Veronica

texts.en:
Veronica is 27 years old and from Naivasha. She is married to Karanja. They have two children that both attend school. She has a general shop which she has operated for the past four years.

She has applied for her third loan from KADET LTD to enable her to increase her stock of sugar, maize, beans, and other goods. She paid her previous loan successfully. With the anticipated income, she plans to start practicing farming and to educate her children.

She hopes to have several general stores in the near future.

loans.use: to buy stock for her shop, ie sugar, flour, maize, beans, and others.

loans.name: Quebrada Seca Group

texts.es: El Banco de Emprendimiento VELOZ DEL NORTE  está compuesto por nueve  integrantes todas mujeres que se dedican a distintas actividades, La presidenta del banco es la Sra. Iradia tiene 44 años, casada tiene cuatro hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa según la temporada,  en su puesto de venta que se encuentran en la localidad de Quebrada Seca de ahi el nombre del grupo, este préstamo es su  segunda secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Iradia va a usar este préstamo para la compra de ropa por mayor como chompas y chamarras  para surtir su negocio, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es falta de capital, la Sra. Iradia enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia diaria, va a utilizar los beneficios en seguir mejorando su puesto de venta, su deseo para su negocio tener mercadería surtida para ofrecer variedad de productos a su clientes, l la Sra. Iradia se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado ya que le permite mejorar en su negocio.
texts.en:
The community bank “Veloz del norte”  (speed of the north) is comprised of 9 members who are all women and work in distinct activities. The president of the bank is Iradia. She is 44-years-old, she is married with 4 children who are of school age. She works in the sale of clothing depending on the season. Her store is located in Quebrada Seca (Dry Revine) from which the name of the group is derived. 


This will be her second loan through the group. Iradia will use the loan to purchase wholesale clothing such as sweaters and jackets to supply her business. The reason she is requesting the loan is because she lacks capital. On a daily basis, Iradia confronts competitive challenges to her business. She will use the loan and continue to improve her store. Her dream for her business is to have a variety of supplies to offer her clients. Iradia is happy and grateful to the institution for the help provided that will allow her to improver her business.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale clothing such as sweaters and jackets

loans.name: Erika Massiel

texts.es: Erika, es una joven de 29 años de edad, casada madre de un niño de 8 meses de nacido, el esposo trabaja como guarda de seguridad, la prioridad de ellos ahorita es toda para su pequeño bebe, desea ahorrar para poderle ofrecer un futuro digno, lo que podrá hacer con mucho trabajo, Erika empezó en el negocio vendiendo frutas en los diferentes semáforos de la capital Managua, hoy en día tiene su propia pulpería con la que pretende salir adelante, es por eso que solicita este crédito para invertirle variedad de productos, para garantizar la venta diaria para el sustento del hogar.
texts.en: Erika is a young woman who is 29-years-old. She is married and a mother of an 8-month-old boy. Her husband works as a security guard. Their priority is to do everything for their baby. She hopes to save money to offer him a better future. She will be able to do this with a lot of hard work. Erika started a business selling fruit at different streetlights in the capital Managua. Today she has her own grocery store with which she hopes to get ahead. For this reason she is requesting a loan to invest in a variety of products to guarantee sales that will sustain her household.

loans.use: to purchase basic grains, oil, meats, soap,sausages, and dairy products among other things

loans.name: Hadjah

texts.en:
Hadjah lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with seven children, five of whom attend school. She is also looking after her mother.

She has been operating a retail shop for the last 10 years, working seven days a week. She also sells second-hand clothes in mobile markets to earn more income.

She has requested a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan shillings from MCDT- SACCO to enable her to stock more bags of sugar, crates of soda and cartons of fruit juice for sale. Her challenges include thieves and transportation. Her dream is to open a second outlet. She joined MCDT because of its timely loans and transactions that take place near her home. She stays in her husband's house with access to both electricity and piped water. Her major monthly expenses include food and school fees.

loans.use: To buy more bags of sugar, cartons of salt, boxes of soap and cartons of fruit juice.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth lives in the Eldoret area of Kenya, which is extremely fertile for agriculture. She has three children and has been doing this work for four years.  Her primary income sources are milk, eggs and crops.

She stated what is most enjoyable about farming: "feeding her animals." Her biggest challenge is getting dairy feeds. An animal on the farm has been given the names of Cheeipis.

Elizabeth was asked why she chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan, to which she replied: 'It offers good training to farmers." This client was also asked what was learned during Juhudi's required micro-finance training session: "credit management."

Her highest monthly expense is farming costs. When asked how this loan would benefit her family, Elizabeth replied, "It will help her pay school fees on time."

As part of Juhudi's loan-appraisal process, each borrower's assets are evaluated. Elizabeth owns the following: cow, poultry and motorcycle, but does not own a pig, pump, bicycle or automobile. Juhudi Kilimo also tries to measure any change in living standards based on this loan. This borrower has in the household a mosquito net, electricity, TV and DVD, but does not have solar power, running water or a sewing machine.

Note: To create this loan profile, Juhudi Kilimo used a mobile device to gather information in the field and send the data to a central online repository, thus reducing paper use, making the process more efficient, and keeping costs down.

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Gretchemany

texts.en:
Gretchemany is a 30-year-old married woman from Talibon, Bohol. She has three children. The oldest child is 14 while the youngest is 4. She engages in fishing. She sells fish. Her husband is a fisherman. He catches fish, sea shells and even crabs. She has been fishing for six years. 

She requested a loan of 12,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) to buy fishing materials like a fish net, floater and weight lifter. In the future, Gretchemany would like to expand her business to support her family and to finance the studies of her children.

loans.use: to buy fishing materials, including a fishing net, floater, and weight lifter.

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora

texts.es:
La señora María Auxiliadora se dedica a la actividad de venta de artículos plásticos como barriles, pochingas, sacos vacíos  desde hace 17 años.

  su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitación en un barrio  de chinandega, la señora empezó su negocio con poca mercadería y con aporte propio, la señora  tiene dos hijos de los cuales ninguno de ella depende de ella, la señora se esfuerza por  que le gusta ser una señora con muchos logros, le gusta  acondicionar su hogar y con las ganancias que le quedan ella  mejora su vivienda y su negocio.
texts.en:
Maria Auxiliadora has worked in the sale of articles of plastic such as barrels, containers, and empty sacks for 17 years. 

Her business is located in her home in the neighborhood of Chinandega. She started her business with little merchandise and with her own contribution. She has two children who do not depend on her. She is trying hard because she likes to be a woman with many achievements and she likes to improve her home and her business with the leftover earnings.

loans.use: to purchase plastic barrels, sacks and containers

loans.name: Carlos Isaac

texts.es:
El joven Carlos Isaac es una persona con espíritu de superación, trabajador, responsable, dependen de él dos hijos que tiene a su cargo, labora desde hace tres años actualmente  se desempeña como guarda de seguridad en una institución del estado. 

Se presento a la oficina de Ceprodel con el objetivo de solicitar un préstamo para poder terminar la construcción de su vivienda, este préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de materiales de cemento, arena y pago de mano de obra.

Los sueños del Joven Carlos Isaac es ver su casita bien acondicionada con el apoyo que Ceprodel le pueda brindarle.
texts.en:
Carlos Isaac is a young man who is determined to succeed and survive. He is hardworking, responsible and has two sons who are dependent on him. For three years he has been working as a security guard at a state institution.

He approached Ceprodel's office to apply for a loan to assist in completing the construction of his home. This loan will be invested in labor payment and the purchase of materials such as cement and sand.

Carlos Isaac's dream is to see his house completed with the support offered to him by Ceprodel.

loans.use: to pay construction expenses for his house

loans.name: Yolanda Margarita

texts.es: Yolanda de 44 años de edad habita en la ciudad de Cartagena con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos en las edades de 8 y 19 años. Allí tiene un negocio desde hace 15 años, cuando inició con un pequeño negocio comprando artículos en promoción para venderlos en su natal Carmen de Bolívar, municipio ubicado en el departamento de Bolívar., esto lo hizo porque siempre le ha gustado manejar su propio dinero y tener autonomía. Así mismo inició con su propio taller de confecciones haciendo vestidos a las personas más cercanas a su familia. Poco a poco con sus dos actividades ha logrado aumentar sus ingresos y hoy con mayores expectativas de crecer se ha acercado a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para acceder a un credikiva, primer financiamiento  que hace a  esta organización, con la cual comprará telas, hilos y otros materiales  para elaborar multiusos, y también invertirá en artículos como perfumería ropa, cremas para damas. Con esta inversión su negocio mejorará porque le permitirá capitalizar comprando en mayor volumen y justamente mas barato. Su meta mas adelante es tener un punto de exhibición o miscelánea con el fin de impactar su mercado y concentrar cada vez más a su clientela.
texts.en: Yolanda is 44-years-old and lives in the city of Cartagena with her spouse and her children that are 8 and 19 years old. She has had her business for 15 years in the city she is from. She began her small business buying articles on sale and selling them in her hometown of Carmen de Bolivar, a municipality located in the department of Bolivar. She started the business because she has always liked managing her own money and be autonomous. Similarly, she began her own tailor business making dresses her closest family members. Little by little she has been able to increase her income and today with expectations to grow she has been involved with the Foundation Mario Santa Domingo to get a Kiva credit. This is her first loan with the organization. She will use the money to buy fabric, thread, and other materials to elaborate her work and also invest in articles such as perfume, clothing, and lotion for women. With this investment her business will grow because it allows her to purchase in greater volume at a better price.  Her long term goal is to have a point of exhibition in order to impress her market and concentrate on her clients.

loans.use: to purchase fabric, thread and other materials and invest in articles such as perfume, clothing, and women's lotion

loans.name: Noel Antonio

texts.es:
El señor Noel Antonio reside en casa propia desde hace más de catorce años en Managua, es casado, tiene de trabajar tres años en una empresa del estado. De esta manera él labora para tener su ingreso que le sustenta los gastos familiares. 

El señor Noel Antonio se presento a las oficinas de Ceprodel por segunda vez a solicitar un financiamiento para poder construir su servicio higiénico en su casa de habitación que ha ido construyendo con esfuerzo propio.
 
El solicita este crédito ya que sus ingresos familiares mensuales no son lo suficiente como para asumir por su propia cuenta los gastos que implica la construcción de dichos servicio, por lo que él pide se le aprobé este crédito y lograr mejorar su casa de habitación y agradece de antemano le sea aprobado el crédito ya que quiere mejorar las condiciones de su casa y  mejor el nivel de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Noel Antonio has been living in his own home in Managua for over 14 years. He is married and has been working for a state enterprise for three years. His work enables him to earn an income to sustain the family and cover expenses. 

He approached the Ceprodel offices a second time to apply for a loan to assist in building a toilet facility in his home, which he built himself. 
 
Noel Antonio is requesting this loan as his monthly income is not enough to take on the construction expenses, therefore he is requesting approval for this loan so that he can improve his home.  He would like to give thanks in advance for the help in improving housing conditions for his family and the standard of living for his children.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials

loans.name: Luis Carlos

texts.es:
El joven Luis Carlos es una persona con buenos valores morales y de buenas costumbres, trabajador, responsable,  labora desde hace siete años, actualmente  se desempeña como guarda de seguridad en una de universidad del estado, su estado civil es soltero, tiene bajo su cargo a sus padres. 

El joven Luis Carlos se presento a Ceprodel  con el objetivo de solicitar un préstamo para realizar cambio del techo ya que se aproximan las lluvias, este préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de materiales de láminas de cinz, pelin y pago de mano de obra.

El agradece a CEPRODEL y KIVA por el apoyo que puedan brindarle otorgándole este financiamiento que ayudara a mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Young Luis Carlos is a person with good moral values and good habits. He is hard-working and responsible. He has been working for seven years, and he is currently a security guard in one of the state universities. He is single and cares for his parents.

The young man, Luis Carlos, turned to CEPRODEL with the objective of requesting a loan to make changes to his roof since the rain is coming. He will invest this loan in purchasing corrugated galvanized iron sheets and paying for labor.

He is grateful to CEPRODEL and Kiva for the support they can offer him by granting this financing which will help him to improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to cover construction costs

loans.name: Nidia Del  Socorro

texts.es:
La señora Nidia Del Socorro vive en un barrio de Managua, es una persona soltera preparada con un nivel académico de docente, se desempeña en esta labor desde hace tres años en una universidad privada. 

se presento la señora Nidia Del Socorro a Ceprodel para solicitar un préstamo, para repellar pared  de su vivienda, este préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de materiales de cemento, arena y pago de mano de obra.

El agradece a CEPRODEL y KIVA por el apoyo que puedan brindarle otorgándole este financiamiento que ayudara a mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Nidia Del Socorro lives in a district of Managua. She is single and she is trained as a teacher. She has been teaching for three years at a private university.

Nidia Del Socorro approached CEPRODEL to request a loan in order to plaster the walls of her home. She will invest this loan in purchasing materials, such as cement and sand, and paying for labor.

She is grateful to CEPRODEL and Kiva for the support they can give her by granting this financing which will help her to improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to cover construction costs

loans.name: Felix Daniel

texts.es:
Felix tiene 23 años, cursa el decimo ciclo en una Universidad local 
Felix estudia Ingeniería de Sistemas le faltan 6 meses para terminar su carrera, actualmente está trabajando como Analista programador esto le sirve para desarrollar su futura profesión. Félix estudia aproximadamente 30 horas semanales y es muy dedicado, el préstamo que ha solicitado le servirá para pagar las mensualidades de un ciclo y así culminar su carrera. Félix se siente muy contento porque gracias a EDAPROSPO ha podido vencer un gran obstáculo que es  la parte económica, sabe que en el futuro gracias a sus estudios se le abrirán muchas puertas.
texts.en:
Felix is 23 years old, and is in his tenth semester at a local university.

Felix studies Systems Engineering and only has six months to go before he finishes his degree. He is currently working as a Programmer Analyst, which helps him to develop his future career. Felix studies for approximately 30 hours a week and is very dedicated. The loan he has requested will pay for his monthly fees for a semester and will thereby enable him to finish his degree. Felix feels very content because thanks to EDAPROSPO he has managed to overcome a great obstacle, which is finances, and he knows that in the future many doors will open for him because of his studies.

loans.use: to pay his monthly university fees

loans.name: Gbenonkpo Group

texts.fr: Le groupe GBENONKPO est composé de trois personnes qui sont des cohabitantes. La représentante du groupe, nommée Marcelline est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Marcelline est âgée de 23 ans. Marcelline n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Marcelline est mariée à un couturier du nom de François. Le couple a deux enfants. Aucun des enfants n'est scolarisé, mais eux tous sont à leur charge. Marcelline vit avec ses enfants et son mari. Marcelline assiste son mari en ce qui concerne les charges familiales. Pour ce faire, Marcelline exerce comme activité la vente de tissus depuis sept ans. Marcelline s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Marcelline sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe GBENONKPO, un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
The Gbenonkpo group is made up of three people who live together. The representative of the group, who is named Marcelline, is the one whose hand is raised in the photo. 

Marcelline is 23 years old and did not go to school. She is married to a tailor named Francois. The couple has two children, both under their care. The children have not been to school. Marcelline lives with her children and husband. She helps her husband with the family expenses.

To do this, Marcelline has been selling fabrics for seven years. She procures her goods from a market in Benin. 

In order to satisfy her customers and to increase sales and her earnings, Marcelline is asking, together with the other members of the Gbenonkpo group, for a first loan through Alide.

loans.use: to buy fabrics

loans.name: Kiomy Candy

texts.es:
Kiomy es una jovencita de 18 años estudiante de Administración en Turismo y Hotelería
Kiomy siempre se ha interesado por el turismo, fue así que decidió escoger esta carrera que dura 05 años; de los cuales ya tiene estudiando un año y medio a Kiomy también le gusta los idiomas y el arte, en el futuro le gustaría desarrollar su carrera trabajando en una agencia de viaje o en una empresa hotelera, el préstamo que ha solicitado le servirá para el pago de su pensión en la universidad, su mayor deseo es continuar sus estudios para darle a su madre todo lo que se merece.
Kiomy esta agradecida a los inversores que hicieron posible su préstamo.
texts.en:
Kiomy is a young 18-year-old who is studying Tourism and Hotel Administration.  She always has been interested in tourism so finally decided on this career which takes five years to finish.  So far she has been studying for a year and a half.  She also enjoys foreign languages and art, and in the future would like to work for a travel agency or hotel.  The loan she is requesting will pay for her living allowance at the university.

Her greatest goal is to finish her education and give her mother everything she deserves.  

Kiomy is grateful to the lenders who are making her loan possible.

loans.use: To pay for her living allowance at the university.

loans.name: Ayidote De So-Kpa Group

texts.fr: Le groupe AYIDOTE DE SO-KPA est composé de trois personnes qui sont des amies de longue date. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Ayaba Sibiatou Denise est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Ayaba Sibiatou Denise est âgée de 52 ans et a fréquenté l’école jusqu'au niveau secondaire. Ayaba Sibiatou Denise est une veuve. Ayaba Sibiatou Denise a trois enfants tous scolarisés. Les enfants de Ayaba Sibiatou Denise ne sont plus à sa charge. Ayaba Sibiatou Denise vit seule. Afin de répondre à ses besoins, Ayaba Sibiatou Denise vend des produits de soins (pâtes dentifrices, brosses à dents) et des tissus depuis dix ans. Ayaba Sibiatou Denise s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Ayaba Sibiatou Denise sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe AYIDOTE DE SO-KPA, un sixième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The Ayidote De So-Kpa group is made up of three people who are long-time friends. The representative of the group, who is named Ayaba Sibiatou Denise, is the one whose hand is raised in the photo. 

Ayaba Sibiatou Denise is 52 years old and a widow. She went to school until the secondary level. She has three children, who have all been to school and who are now no longer under her care. She lives alone.

In order to meet her needs, Ayaba Sibiatou Denise has been selling personal care products (toothpaste, toothbrushes, etc.) and fabrics for ten years. She procures her goods in a market in Benin. 

In order to satisfy her customers and to increase her sales and earnings, Ayaba Sibiatou Denise is asking, together with the other members of the Ayidote De So-Kpa group, for their sixth loan with Alide. Their previous loans have all been re-paid.

loans.use: to buy fabrics

loans.name: Empresarios Exitosos Group

texts.es:
Victoria es miembro del grupo Empresarios Exitosos.

Victoria tiene 47 años y tiene 02 hijos, uno en la universidad y otro en el colegio. Con el propósito de ayudar a su esposo decidió poner una bodega, para eso utilizo una parte de su casa donde empezó su negocio, al principio tenía muy pocos productos pero poco a poco su inversión fue creciendo y en la actualidad su bodega es una de las mejores en su localidad, allí vende productos variados como bebidas gaseosas, golosinas, frutas y abarrotes. Victoria trabaja todos los días de la semana sus hijos a veces la ayudan pero ella quiere que sus hijos solo se dediquen a estudiar, con el préstamo que recibirá quiere seguir implementando su negocio comprando mas productos para su bodega, con eso espera mejorar su negocio y aumentar sus ingresos.

Victoria está emocionada por saber que personas de todo el mundo la van apoyar en su negocio, en la fotografía es la segunda de la izquierda viste chaleco gris y polo color turquesa.
texts.en:
Victoria is a member of the communal bank "Empresarios Exitosos".  She is 47 and has two children, one at the university and one in school.  In order to help her husband she decided to open a store using a space in her home.  At first she had only a few products but little by little her investment began to grow and now she has one of the best stores in the town.  She sells a variety of products such as sodas, sweets, fruit and groceries.

Victoria works every day of the week and her children help sometimes, even though she wants them to focus on their education.  She will use the loan she receives to continue stocking her store with more products.  The aim is to improve her business and increase her income.

Victoria is touched knowing that people around the world are helping with her business.  She is shown in the photograph second from the left in a turquoise top and gray vest.

loans.use: To buy products for her store.

loans.name: Wanyinan 2 Group

texts.fr: Le groupe WANYINAN 2 est composé de trois personnes qui exercent dans le même secteur d'activité. La représentante du groupe, nommée Bossi Jeanne est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Bossi Jeanne est âgée de 36 ans. Bossi Jeanne a fréquenté l’école jusqu'au niveau primaire. Bossi Jeanne est mariée. Le couple a un enfant scolarisé et à leur charge. Bossi Jeanne vit avec son enfant et son mari. Bossi Jeanne et son mari assure ensemble les charges familiales. Pour ce faire, Bossi Jeanne vend des fruits depuis une vingtaine d’années. Bossi Jeanne s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu,  Bossi Jeanne sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe  WANYINAN 2, un  premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
The Wanyinan 2 group is made up of three people who all work in the same type of business. The representative of the group, named Bossi Jeanne, is the one whose hand is raised in the photo. 

Bossi Jeanne is 36 years old and has been through primary school. She is married. The couple has one child, who has been to school and is under their care. Bossi Jeanne lives with her son and her husband. She and her husband together take care of the family expenses.

To do this, Bossi Jeanne has been selling fruits for 20 years. She procures her goods in a market in Benin. In order to satisfy her customers and to increase her sales and earnings, Bossi Jeanne is asking, together with the other members of the Wanyinan 2 group, for a first loan with Alide.

loans.use: to buy fruits

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy corn, pork, vegetables, sodas, and firewood.

loans.name: Ayidote Group

texts.fr: Le groupe AYIDOTE est composé de trois personnes qui sont des cohabitantes. La représentante du groupe, nommée Juliette est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Juliette est âgée de 31 ans. Juliette a très peu fréquenté l’école. Juliette est mariée et a deux enfants, tous scolarisés. En dehors de ses enfants, Juliette a un autre enfant à sa charge. Juliette vit avec ses enfants et son mari. Juliette et son mari assurent ensemble les charges familiales.  Afin d’assurer les diverses charges du ménage, Juliette exerce comme activité la vente d'igname et de haricot depuis sept ans. Juliette vend également des tissus de façon secondaire. Juliette s’approvisionne dans un un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Juliette sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe AYIDOTE, un cinquième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The Ayidote group is made up of three people who live together. The representative of the group, named Juliette, is the one whose hand is raised in the photo.

Juliette is 31 years old and has attended a little bit of school. She is married and has two children, who have been to school. In addition to her own children, she has another child under her care. Juliette lives with her children and her husband. She and her husband together take care of the family expenses. 

In order to ensure the different household expenses, Juliette has been selling yams and beans for seven years. She equally sells fabrics as a second income. She procures her products in a market in Benin. 

In order to satisfy her customers, and to increase her sales and earnings, Juliette is asking, together with the other members of the Ayidote group, for a fifth loan with Alide. The previous loans have all be re-paid.

loans.use: to buy fabrics

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To put in a cement floor.

loans.name: Duterimbere I Group

texts.fr:
Françoise fait partie du groupe  Duterimbere I et  habite à Gitega. Elle  a 41 ans et est mariée à Jean, un commissionnaire. Ensemble ils ont 8 enfants, âgés de 1 à 21, dont  6  étudient.

Elle fait le commerce de farine depuis  11 ans. 

Elle est à son dix-neuvième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle va  augmenter son capital et acheter une grande quantité de farine  à revendre pour  gagner plus.

Le gain de son commerce, lui permet de satisfaire les besoins de sa famille : se nourrir, se vêtir, payer les frais  scolaires des enfants.
texts.en:
Francoise is a member of the Duterimbere I group and lives in Gitega. She is 41 years old and is married to Jean, a porter. Together, they have eight children, aged from 1 to 21 years old. Six of the children go to school.

Francoise has been selling flour for 11 years. She is on her 19th loan with Turame. With this Kiva-financed loan, she is going to increase her capital and buy a large quantity of flour to resell and earn more. 

The earnings from this commerce will allow her to meet the needs of her family: food, clothing, and to pay the children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy flour to resell

loans.name: Exauce De Dieu Group

texts.fr: Le groupe EXAUCE DE DIEU est composé de trois personnes qui sont des cohabitantes. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Rouyakatou est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Rouyakatou est âgée de 25 ans. Rouyakatou n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Depuis une dizaine d'années Rouyakatou vend des divers( sucre, lait, savons) et des condiments dans sa boutique. De façon secondaire Rouyakatou fait de la tresse. Rouyakatou est mariée à un vulgarisateur du nom de Ignace. Le couple a trois enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Rouyakatou vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. les différentes charges de la famille sont assumées par Rouyakatou et son mari. Rouyakatou s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Rouyakatou sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe EXAUCE DE DIEU, un quatrième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
EXAUCE DE DIEU Group is made up of three people who live in the same house. The group's representative, named Rouyakatou, is the one raising her hand in the photograph. She's 25 years old and never attended school. For about ten years, Rouyakatou has been selling various items (sugar, milk, soaps) and condiments in her shop. As a secondary business, she also braids hair.

Rouyakatou is married to a vulcanizer named Ignace. The couple has three school-attending children, whom they have to support. Rouyakatou lives together with her husband and children. The couple jointly takes care of the family expenses.

Rouyakatou gets her supplies in a market in Benin. Eager to satisfy her clientele and increase her revenue and income, Rouyakatou, together with the other members of her group, is seeking a fourth loan from Kiva's partner, ALIDé. Previous loans were repaid without problems.

loans.use: to buy various products (sugar, milk, soaps) and condiments

loans.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe  BENKADI  est constitué de  5 femmes toutes mariées ayant une moyenne d’âge de 34 ans et 3 enfants. Elles vivent  dans des  familles traditionnelles élargies dans le quartier HEREMAKONO NORD de la ville de Bougouni. 
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, d’amitié et de commerce. Pour renforcer leur capacité financière afin de mieux faire leur commerce, elles ont adhéré  à l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso avec laquelle elles sont à leur troisième prêt. Les 2 précédents prêts ont été correctement remboursés. Ce groupe de femmes fait le commerce   d’habillements à l’image de ASSAN, elle est la femme assise dans la photo. Elle compte acheter avec son  prêt, 2 balles de friperie avec les grossistes de Bamako. Elle effectue ses ventes au marché  et à domicile, en détail au comptant et à crédit  à une clientèle composée essentiellement de femmes. 
Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 35.000FCFA qui sera  investi dans les activités et rembourser le prêt.
texts.en:
BENKADI Group is made up of five married women, who average 34 years of age and three children. They live in extended traditional families in HEREMAKONO NORD, a neighborhood in Bougouni. They got acquainted through bonds of community, friendship, and business.

To bolster their financial capacity and improve their businesses, they joined Kiva's partner, the MFI Soro Yiriwaso, from which they are seeking their third loan. The previous two were repaid without problems.

The women in this group sell clothing, as does Assan, which is the one sitting in the photograph. She intends to use her loan to buy two bales of used clothing from wholesalers in Bamako.

She retails in the market and at her home, for cash and on credit, to a clientele comprising mostly women. She foresees turning an average monthly profit of XOF 35'000 (ca US$ 70), that she will use to repay the loan and invest in her business.

loans.use: to buy clothes

loans.name: De La Mano Con Jesus Group

texts.es:
Juan es miembro de la alcancía “De la mano con Jesús” 
Juan tiene 55 años, es soltero y trabaja como comerciante, hace 06 meses inauguro una jugueria donde prepara jugos de frutas y sándwiches de todos los sabores, su negocio está ubicado en una calle muy céntrica donde  atiende a mucha gente que acude a su negocio, sobre todo a la hora del desayuno; gracias a su trabajo ha encontrado estabilidad económica y el sustento de su familia, su préstamo será de mucha ayuda para seguir invirtiendo en su negocio, con este préstamo quiere implementar su local con la compra de mobiliario como bancas y vitrinas. Juan desea tener su negocio bien surtido para captar mayor clientela que a su vez le permita tener más ingresos.
Juan quiere decir a los inversores ¡Gracias por el apoyo obtenido! 

la segunda señora de la izquierda es una invitada del grupo.
texts.en:
Juan is a member of the “De La Mano Con Jesús” bank. 
 
Juan is 55 years old. He is single and works as a merchant. Six months ago he opened a juice bar where he prepares fruit juices and sandwiches of all kinds. His business is located on a very central street where there are a lot of people who go to his business, especially for breakfast. Thanks to his work he has found financial stability and support for his family. His loan will be very useful to keep investing in his business. With it, he will outfit his locale by buying benches and a display case. Juan wants to have his own well stocked business to attract more customers that will allow him more income. 
.
Juan wants to tell the investors: thank you for your support!  

The second woman from the left is a guest of the group.

loans.use: to buy furniture such as benches and display cases.

loans.name: Nueva Esperanza Del Algodonal Group

texts.es:
Este es el grupo Nueva Esperanza del Algodonal

Wendy, uno de sus miembros, es soltera y madre de un hijo. Wendy vive con su madre y sus 03 hermanos. Ser  madre soltera le ha creado más responsabilidades, por lo mismo decidió abrir una bodega para poder trabajar sin descuidar a su hijo, fue así que invirtió sus ahorros y compro algunos productos de primera necesidad, de esto hace 03 años en la actualidad su bodega ha crecido mucho y tiene mucha clientela. Wendy se esmera en brindar una buena atención y las personar que acuden a su negocio siempre se van satisfechas por la atención q ella les brinda. El dinero de su préstamo lo invertirá en su bodega con la compra de productos para mantenerla surtida. El sueño de Wendy es que su bodega crezca y poder ampliarla, esta agradecida por la ayuda de las personas que la ayudan.
Wendy  esta vestida con polo a rayas blanco y negro.
texts.en:
This group is called Nueva Esperanza del Algodonal. Wendy, one of its members, is single and has a child. Wendy lives with her mother and three siblings. As a single mother, she has many responsibilities and that is why she decided to open a general store in order to be able to work and take care of her child at the same time. Three years ago, she invested some of her savings in buying staple food products. The store has grown since then and she has many customers now. Wendy tries hard to provide a good service and those who visit her store, leave satisfied with the service she offers. 

Wendy will use the money from the loan in her store, to buy supplies and keep it stocked. Her dream is to expand her business and enlarge the store. She feels grateful to those who help her.

Wendy is wearing a white and black, striped shirt.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her store.

loans.name: Claudia Roxana

texts.es:
Claudia tiene 24 años de edad, esta acompañada y tiene dos hijos. Desde la edad de los 10 años aprendió a cultivar la tierra; fueron sus padres quienes le enseñaron, ya que no había otro oficio o estudio que aprender. Ella cultiva maíz y hortalizas, como pepino, tomate y chile los que vende al interior de la misma comunidad. Para llegar al terreno en donde siembra tiene que caminar dos kilómetros a pie por laderas y calles muy empinadas ya que esta cerca de un cerro. Para comprar los insumos agrícolas, debe bajar por calles empinadas hasta llegar al lugar en donde aborda el autobús que tarda treinta minutos. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar 8 sacos de fertilizantes, 50 libras de maíz, semilla y otros insumos para el cultivo de maíz y hortalizas. A ella se le dificulta viajar al pueblo a comprar los insumos y con la inversión comprara por mayor para no viajar tanto y ahorrar tiempo y dinero al mismo tiempo que hará uso de los insumos en el tiempo oportuno. Su objetivo es terminar de construir su casa de ladrillo que poco a poco la esta construyendo.
texts.en:
Claudia is 24 years old. She has a partner and two children. When she was 10 years old, she learned to work the land. Her parents are the ones that taught her, since there was no other trade to learn or subject to study. She grows corn and vegetables such as cucumbers, tomatoes and chiles that she sells within her own community. To arrive at the land where she plants she has to walk two kilometers on foot on very steep hills and streets, since it's close to a mountain. To buy the farming materials, she has to go down through steep streets till she gets to the place where she can catch the bus, which takes thirty minutes. 

The loan she is asking for from Fundación Campo is to buy 8 sacks of fertilizer, 50 pounds of corn, seeds and other materials to grow corn and vegetables. For her it is difficult to travel to town to buy the materials, and with the investment she will buy in a large quantity so that she won't have to travel as much and can save time and money. She will also use the materials in a timely manner. Her goal is to finish her brick house that she building little by little.

loans.use: to buy 8 sacks of fertilizer, 50 pounds of corn, seed and other materials to grow corn and vegetables.

loans.name: Marta Alicia Antonia

texts.es:
Marta tiene 28 años de edad, es madre de dos hijos. Desde la edad de los 13 años aprendió a trabajar en la agricultura; fueron sus padres quienes le enseñaron a sembrar maíz, ya que era su única fuente de ingresos. Ella estudio hasta tercer ciclo; pero luego se acompaño y procreo dos hijos. Actualmente solo vive con sus dos hijos y para subsistir tiene que dedicarse a cultivar maíz, debido a que no puede encontrar otro tipo de trabajo la situación económica no anda muy bien. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar 4 sacos de fertilizantes, un galón de herbicidas y para pago de otras actividades para cultivar 7,000 metros cuadros de maíz. El dinero le servirá para evitar realizar tantos viajes a la ciudad a comprar por poquitos ya que incurre en más gastos y perdida de tiempo. Además, de aplicar todos los insumos en el tiempo apropiado para que su cosecha sea abundante y pueda generarle mejores ingresos. Su gran deseo es brindar el estudio a sus hijos para que sean profesionales y puedan ayudar  a su familia.
texts.en:
Marta is 28 years old. She is the mother of two children. When she was 13, she started to learn to work in agriculture. Her parents were the ones who taught her to plant corn, since it was the only source of income. She went to school up to the third cycle, but then she met her partner and had two children. Now she just lives with her two children and to subsist she grows corn, since she can't find any other type of work, because the economic situation isn't very good. 

The loan she is asking Fundación Campo for is to buy 4 sacks of fertilizer, a gallon of herbicide, and to pay for other activities to plant 7,000 square meters of corn. She will use the money to avoid making so many trips to the city for little things, since she incurs more expenses and wastes more time. In addition, she will use all of the materials at the appropriate time so that her harvest will be abundant and she can generate more income. Her biggest wish is to offer her children an education so that they can have good careers and help their family.

loans.use: to buy 4 sacks of fertilizer, a gallon of herbicide, and to pay for other activities to plant 7,000 square meters of corn.

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
Edna is 49 years old and married with four children. She lives in Tukuran, Zamboanga Del Sur, and owns and operates a vulcanizing service to earn a living. She has been in her business for over eight years and earns 15,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) every month. 
Edna joined GDMPC last year, and has requested a loan of 30,000 PHP to purchase additional materials for her vulcanizing service. Edna's hopes and wants in life are to have a better future and to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials for a vulcanizing service.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret is married and has four kids. Three of her kids still attend school, which is the reason for her hard work.  She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

She has been cooking and selling home made food for the past six years, selling to passersby and neighbors. She cited seasonality and theft as her challenges. 

With the Kshs 20,000 she wants to purchase 2 bundles of wheat flour and cooking oil. Her dream is to see her children get a better education and become important people in the society.

loans.use: to purchase 2 bundles of wheat flour and cooking oil.

loans.name: Juanita

texts.en: Juanita is 56 years old and married with 5 children. She lives in Tukuran, Zamboanga Del Sur. She owns and operates a food vending business to earn a living. She has been in her business for over 6 years and earns about 9,000PHP every month. She joined GDMPC in the year 2009, and now she has requested a loan of 13,500PHP to purchase additional products to sell. She wants to improve her living situation and finish her children's schooling.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell.

loans.name: Rosemary

texts.en:
Rosemary lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with three children and two of them attend school. She is not looking after any other family members.
She has been running a retail shop from home for seven years, working seven days a week. She also generates additional income from charcoal selling.

She has requested a loan of UGX 1,600,000 from MCDT- SACCO to enable her to stock more rice, sugar, cooking oil, sesame, Irish potatoes and charcoal to sell. Her challenges include transportation and thieves. Her dream is to make her sales much bigger and to start selling on a wholesale basis only. 

She joined MCDT because of their interest in low-income people.  She stays in her husband`s house with access to electricity but no piped water.  Her major monthly expenses include school fees.

loans.use: To buy more rice, sugar, Irish potatoes, sesame and cooking oil.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy piglets and feed for their maintenance.

loans.name: Agress

texts.en:
Agress lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with two children, one of whom attends school. She is not looking after additional family members.

Agress has been operating a retail shop for five years, working seven days a week. She earns additional income from a motorcycle, which she rents to customers.

She has requested a loan of UGX 1,700,000 from MCDT- SACCO to enable her to buy more sugar, soap, soda, rice and cereals for sale. Her challenges include seasonality, thieves and recovering payments from debtors. Her dream is to build her own house and relocate her shop to this house. She also would like to own a fully stocked retail shop. 

Agress joined MCDT in order to boost her business by acquiring credit. She and her family live in a rented house with access to electricity but no piped water.  Her major monthly expenses include rent and transportation costs.

loans.use: To buy more sugar, soap, soda, rice and cereals for sale.

loans.name: Lanie

texts.en:
Lanie is 24 years old and married with one child. She lives in Tukuran, Zamboanga Del Sur. She owns and operates a fish-vending business to earn a living. She has been in her business for more than three years and earns 4,000 PHP every month. 

Lanie joined GDMPC in the year 2009. Now she has requested a loan of 9,000 PHP to purchase additional fish to sell. She wants her business to improve someday.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish to sell.

loans.name: Analina

texts.en:
Analina is a 36-year-old, married woman and mother of six children. She is from San Miguel, Bohol. She has been engaged in a farming business for several years now. Her husband works as a carpenter.

Analina is asking for a loan to buy fertilizers for the farm and to pay the school fees for her children. Through this loan, she will be able to improve her farming business and continue sending her children to school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farm and to pay the school fees for her children.

loans.name: Claribel

texts.es:
Claribel tiene 59 años de edad. Ella se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años; oficio que aprendió de su madre. Se levanta a las 4:00 a.m. para prepararse e irse al terreno en donde tiene sus cultivos en compañía de sus nietos quienes son los que le ayudan.  

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar semilla, fertilizantes y para pago del alquiler de la tierra en donde cultivara. La inversión le será de gran ayuda; ya que comprara todo lo necesario para sembrar y obtener una buena cosecha que le permita vender el grano a buen precio y poder reparar su vivienda que esta bastante deteriorada.
texts.en:
Claribel is fifty-nine years old.  She has made a living in agriculture for several years.  She learned this trade from her mother.  She gets up at 4:00 a.m. in order to prepare herself to go to the land where she has her crops.  She does this in the company of her grandchildren, who help her.

The loan that she is requesting from Fundación Campo will be used to buy seeds and fertilizer, and to pay the rent on the land where she does her farming.  The investment will be a great help, since she will buy everything that is necessary in order to plant and then have a good harvest.  

This will allow her to sell her crops at a good price and to be able to repair her home, which is quite damaged.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer, and to pay the rent on the land where she does her farming.

loans.name: Ronnielyn

texts.en:
Ronnielyn is 31 years old, married, and has three school-aged children.
